title: Crash Zone: Secrets and Lies
creator_contributor_role: Australian Children's Television Foundation, production company
abstract: 'Crash Zone' Series 1, Episode 6. Five radically different kids score part-time jobs testing new computer games. It's a blast, but more than computer programs get tested.
description: Bec is intrigued and delighted by a 'Net romance' she's pursuing. The boys are sceptical and their worst fears are realised when they find out it's really Virgil writing love letters to Bec. Pi tries to think of a way to save Bec from the humiliation of finding out she's romancing a program! How can she do this when her own lies are getting her deeper in trouble herself? Stars Frances Wang as Bec, Damien Bodie as Ram, Cassandra Magrath as Pi, Paul Pantano as Marcello, Nikolai Nikolaeff as Mike and Nicki Wendt as Alex.
